notes.text: Thought ladder would be less cancerous after CA nerf, but I was completely wrong. Would have gotten Kog in 30 games if it werent for different bamboo variations every 4th-5th match and Dark world otk's. Really good matchup vs most control decks, but struggles vs burn and phoenix. Got kog after 50 games in total. Since their monster returns on your turn you can just switch dream clown into defense once they return and monster ratios in most control decks atm are lower than S/T. Which means if you get the clown/doom lord going they will eventually run out of monsters.
